Description.description: The Donation Import entity acts as a holding entity to process external donations and import them into MISSION CRM.
Unique identifier of the user who created the record.
Date and time when the record was created.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.
Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.
Date and time when the record was modified.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Owner Id
Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record
Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.
Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.
The total cash, credit or transaction amount (typically the receiptable, Nonreceiptable, membership and any tax amounts)
Value of the Total Paid in base currency.
The Non-Receiptable amount that is passed tot eh gift record
Value of the Amount (Non-Tax Deductible) in base currency.
This is the amount (typically dollar value although this application is capable of multiple currencies) of the donation
Value of the Amount (Tax Deductible) in base currency.
The amount of tax attributed to this donation import record
Value of the Amount (Tax) in base currency.
The appeal this gift is related to. The appeal is filtered by the campaign . event record. Only appeals that are assigned to the campaign /event in question can be used.
The city of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The Country of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The first line of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The second line of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The third line of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The ZIP or postal code of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The state of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The birthdate of the donor.

The date and time attribute that is defaulted to today’s date however can be overridden to record either a postdated donation, a donation that is yet to occur and previous dates to record historical t
Updates or sets the related communication preferences
Updates or sets the related communication preferences
The type of card, this should default based on the first four digits of the credit card number
The Check number of the payment process
The Check or Wire date of the transaction
The constituent lookup selected
The city of the constituent billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The Constituent Country of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The first line of the constituent billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The second line of the constituent billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The third line of the constituent billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The Constituent ZIP or postal code of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The constituent state of the billing address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The primary constituent email address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The First name of the Constituent
The Last name of the Constituent
The Middle name of the Constituent
The salutation of the constituent record
The constituent primary phone number, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The unique receipt identifier as provided by the import process or source.
The source of the gift, typically this will either be in person, phone, mail or online and the user can select in person, phone or mail when creating a donation manually.
The Designation used for this gift, typically this is defaulted to a value when a campaign / event is selected. The user can alter the default fund at any time prior to the processing of the gift.
Unique identifier for entity instances
The related constituent or organization that the donation is related to.
The donor type which is either individual or organization.
Updates or sets the related communication preferences.
Updates or sets the related communication preferences.
Updates or sets the related communication preferences
Updates or sets the related communication preferences
Updates or sets the related communication preferences
The primary email address, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The First name of the Donor
The gender of the donor.
This is a look up to the gift record if a gift record that is not a recurring donation is created.
The Last name of the Donor
The Middle name of the Donor
The Organization Name of the Donor
The related package lookup this is typically filtered by the related appeal.
The type of gift that the donation or pledge represents, typically this will be Cash, Credit/Debit Card or Cheque however also covers In Kind and Other
The Deposit date of the Cheque or Wire Transfer
The salutation of the donor being imported
The primary phone number, defaulted from the contact or account selected.
The third party receipt number often already generated form the system that received the donation
The unique receipt identifier as provided by the import process or source.
Status of the Donation Import
Status of the Donation Import
Reason for the status of the Donation Import
Reason for the status of the Donation Import
For internal use only.
Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
